name: epeli

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cep, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The membership relation and the membership predicate agree when the "containing" class is a set. Inference associated with ~ epelg . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2012.)
